manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: These amazing H.VERSAILTEX 100% Blackout Linen Curtain Panels are your perfect home guard. Keep the light out and help to retain the warmth in winter and keep the cool in the summer High performance on blocking out full 100% light, UV prevent, bring the uniform style of your houseThese magic curtains will darken the room perfectly and help those day sleepers to get enough relaxation and spirit, made the body more healthy and powerAccuated choices for bedroom, patio, front porch, pergola, cabana, covered patio and living room/dining room

Crafted from durable blackout faux linen fabric, feature thermal insulated, soundproof, fade-resistant, energy-efficient. Thread trimmed and wrinkle-free, both sides are the same color.Natural blackout effect ensure the curtains have no chemical coating, formaldehyde free, safe and green to kids and nursery.

Fabric Weight: More heavy and thick than the normal blackout curtains in the market, both sides of the curtains are linen, thus will make curtain more energy-efficient, drapery and durable.Curtains that are both beautiful, comfortable and practical，refresh and brighten your home space of any style

Each panel with 8 anti rust grommets (rim of grommet is 2.4", while inner is 1.6"), fitting up to 1 1/4" curtain rods / polesThese faux linen curtains are thick, durable enough to hold their beauty through sun shine
Color Pattern Options: Stone Blue, Grey, Taupe, Off White, White, Ivory, Sage and more new coming.Versatility Dimension Options: 52"W x 54"L / 52"W x 63"L / 52"W x 84"L / 52"W x 96"L

Machine washable in cold water, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry low and warm iron as neededFor proper fullness, recommended purchased the panels measure 2-3 times the width of your window

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are legitimately excellent
reviews.reviewText: These are absolutely the next best option to custom made and measured drapes. Hands down. If you aren’t considering custom measured and designed drapes - stop searching, pick a color, and order these.These are thick, totally blackout, soft, and have none of the gross vinyl blackout liner on the window-facing side. Truly a differentiated level of thickness and quality.Of course they are wrinkled out of the packaging. You buy a $40 handheld steamer and it takes about 30 minutes to perfect 15 panels - I timed it. Looks beautiful. Could not be easier.Bottom line is I’ve had $50k of curtains before, and this cost me less than $1000, including hardware, with a mixture of 108”, 96”, and 84” long curtains throughout the house - and neither my wife nor kids nor friends can tell the difference. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more bright room at night
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, I live near a train station which is pretty noisy, so I'm not sure about the noise blocking level of this curtain since the train is still very loud. I understand that train noise is not easy to block away.The light blocking is very good, My room used to be very bright at night thanks to the street lights, this curtain surely does not let the light go through. However, to completely black out a room, you need to make suer it covers the whole window and seal all the possible gaps. Mine is simply hanged on the blinds and there is a 2 inch on top of my curtain. So my room is still pertty bright at morning when the curtail is closed.The curtain itself is solid and is not too heavy, I hope it last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty quality
reviews.reviewText: I love these so much they are in my living room and bedroom, same color. They match the paint color White Duck perfectly! Blackout and heavy duty.The did take a while to iron before hanging up though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are fantastic they feel thick, heavy and sturdy. The holes all align perfectly with the same space between all of them making them be extremely symmetrical. The only flaw I see is that the wrinkles that they come with are VERY deep and even after ironing them twice and washing I could not get them all out so I highly recommend ironing them and then spraying them with water for a day or two so that they can dewrinkle themselves. After doing that they look utterly delightful and make any small room look so much bigger and brighter without having light come in which is a must have in a desert community. So far my living has felt cooler and these are 100 percent black out curtains. Beware that the off white is still a very bright white but it didn't bother me too much as my lighting is a soft golden setting so they matched it well. Overall if your going to buy curtains buy these !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are beautiful curtains and a true white. Nice material like a canvas , which I really like. Unfortunately, they aren’t full blackout, so they had to be returned 😞. With hot south weather, I need something thermal & full blackout. They are definitely room darkening, just not full blackout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These look great. Thick material and they blockout light nicely. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wish I could rate them higher than 5 star. These are quality and the price makes them even nicer. Arrived quickly, exactly as described and 100% room darkening. Hung very nicely. I would most definitely buy these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality! Very satisfied.
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for. I would buy them again.

Curtains are heavy and thick and totally block out light. I love the colour (sage) and that they are a quality looking casual. Exactly what I was looking for. I did have to iron them from being in their package but they iron easily and hang nicely.
Blackout light is great. Although some can still come in through the top and bottom. They are not wrinkle free but are a great material to work with.
Ordered this for one of the bedrooms and really love the linen look to it. Colour is spot on!

I had returned a number of curtains in the past couple of months because they either looked cheap, felt cheap or were just plain ugly. However, these curtains did not disappoint. The colour is perfect and the material is nice and heavy and definitely block out light. Good quality material. I took away one star because they do flare a little on the bottom, other than that they are perfect, would definately purchase again.

The media could not be loaded. I got the green colour and it’s beautiful! Really blocks out the sun as well. Video doesn’t do the colour justice honestly, it looks grey here but in person it’s a perfect muted sage. Super happy with it!
